inclusion.criterion: Age between 1 month and 24 months of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least an average of 4 seizures/week in baseline period
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Failed response to previous trial of two anti-epileptic drugs
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Children with written informed consent from parent/guardian
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: < 4 seizures/week on average in baseline period
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He presented with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
